episodes.title: What I Learned Escaping a Cult — and How It Can Help Us Heal
episodes.description:
I don’t usually share this publicly, but it’s part of my story: I was groomed into a cult.

At first it felt like belonging… until I realized I was being manipulated through love-bombing, gaslighting, isolation, and control. One of the hardest parts was watching others stay silent — even when they knew what was happening — because they were too afraid to question or leave.

In this video, I share how I found the courage to walk away, and why I now see the same tactics being used in the world around us. We’re constantly told it’s us vs. them, right vs. wrong, red vs. blue. But that’s just a distraction.

Because while we’re fighting each other, the people at the top — the billionaires funding both sides — keep getting richer. Division feeds the system.

This isn’t about choosing a side. It’s about remembering our shared humanity, asking deeper questions, and finding our way back to ourselves.

💬 I’d love to hear from you: how do you come back to your own truth when the world feels loud and divided?

And if you need support, want to work with me, or simply want someone to listen — I’m here. DM me or email embodiedwithemma@gmail.com. I’d love to hear from you.
